title: Ken Anderson (wrestler)
summary: Kenneth Anderson (born March 6, 1976) is an American professional wrestler, professional wrestling trainer, and ring announcer, who is currently signed to Top Rank Boxing as their announcer. Anderson is known for his tenure with WWE from 2005 to 2009 under the ring name Mr. Kennedy,[11] and his work in Total Nonstop Action Wrestling as Mr. Anderson from 2010 to 2016.
